column5: I got my passport card last summer. I moved from Delaware to PA this past January. Now I know your address isn't on the card, but do I still have to notify someone anyway of my change of address? I just don't want to pull up to customs in sept. only to be turned away because I didn't notify anyone. I don't know what info is on that card when it is scanned.
travel.state.gov/passport/passport_1738.html under "correct or change a US Passport" it doesnt say anything about addresses...
Thanks...I just found that website, and I also can't find anything about a change of address...just a name change. I'm going to call the info # tomorrow to make sure.
